events.name: Weâ€™re Looking For Rockstar Speakers
events.speaker: You!
events.description:
Are you at the forefront of front end technologies? Are you a lover of Progressive Web Apps? Does CSS hold no secrets for you? Is accessibility a driving force of your coding practices? Is the user always right? Do non-performant websites keep you up at night? Share your knowledge with our community of front end developers. 
Fore_Front is looking for rockstar front end developers from our community to speak at our upcoming events. Submit a talk proposal or workshop idea. Sample topics Include: Interactive design, accessibility, performance, UX, responsive development, cross-browser and compatibility, prototyping, teamwork and communication, cross-functional teams
